forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with an inviting promise of warmth beneath a mostly sunny sky. Currently, the air carries an invigorating freshness, a gentle westerly breeze weaving through the streets, adding a lively touch to the mild temperatures. As the afternoon approaches, the sunlight dances across the city, though an undercurrent of coolness tugs gently, reminding you of the ever-present maritime influence. 

While the forecast hints at a drop in temperature later on, the majority of the day looks to be colorful and pleasant, a favorable backdrop for outdoor meanderings or a leisurely lunch at a café basking in the luminous glow. Evening promises a peaceful transition to partly cloudy skies, where the city, cloaked in a soft haze, will settle into a serene night's embrace. Dressing in layers—a light sweater or jacket—might just be the perfect choice, allowing you to embrace the fleeting warmth of the day and the cooler whispers of night. As you navigate the streets, consider indulging in a quiet stroll along the Embarcadero, taking in the sights and sounds, or perhaps find solace in one of the city's tucked-away bookstores, savoring a good read as the sun dips below the horizon.
